about_the_game:
JUST FIGHTING is an exhilarating survival game that plunges players into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies. Developed for adrenaline junkies and strategic thinkers, this game offers a unique and immersive experience like no other.
Setting:
Set in a desolate cityscape, Zombie Hunt showcases the aftermath of a catastrophic viral outbreak that has turned innocent citizens into ravenous undead creatures. Players must navigate through abandoned streets, crumbling buildings, and eerie landscapes while strategizing their every move to stay alive and achieve their objectives.Your goal is to eliminate all zombies and survive!
Gameplay:
Attack the zombies by pressing the left mouse button, restore health by pressing the right mouse button, and move using the WASD keys on the keyboard.
In JUST FIGHTING, survival is the ultimate goal. Players must employ their skills, wit, and resourcefulness to outsmart the undead and other human threats.
CONTENT
– In this treacherous environment, players need to use wisdom and strategy to survive and engage in intense battles with various types of zombies. The game offers a rich variety of gameplay mechanics, allowing players to enter abandoned buildings, vehicles, and other locations while being cautious of lurking zombies.
– Combat is a key element of the game. Players will face the world overrun by zombies on their own. In the game, you will play as the protagonist and survive by using intelligence, skills, and strategy, while engaging in battles with various types of zombies.
– Weather conditions and random events affect gameplay, keeping the game fresh.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
